## Muri iki cigwa, muzokwigwa,
uko camera ikora muri telefone,
icarico « obtunateur » umunwa no Iso.
intangamarara kunyabutatu yo gusigara kwerekana.

![Akarorero ka capteur](2.png)
Igice kinini c’ugutegera ukuntu icuma gifata ifoto gikoro n’uko bagikoresha nugutegera ivyo kidakora neza n’ijisho ry’umuntu.Ijisho rishobora kubona uduce mu bibanza n’umuco utandukanye ushoboka.kw’isonga ry’umusozi uriko urubura nk’akarorero n’umwijima mu bwinjiriro bwinsenga k’uruhande rw’uwo musozi.ivyuma bifata amafoto ntibishobora kenshi utwo amaso yanyu abona. Amasanamu aboneka neza kenshi canke atabona.Ijisho ririhuta guhagarara kuco rishaka mu muce wose urabamwo.Icuma gifata isanamu ira bwirizwa aho ihagarara kenshi hari umuco muke, ntiyihuta.

![Akarorero k’ifoto yatumberejwe nabi hari umuco muke.](3.jpg
Akarorero k’ifoto itatumberejwe hari umuco muke.
![Akarorero k’ifoto yatumberejwe neza hari umuco muke ](4.jpg) 
Akarorero k'ifoto yatumberejwe neza hari umuco muke.

![Caméra ikora gute.](5.png)
##Caméra ikora gute 
Icuma gifara ifoto kigezureho kirasanzere cane gifise agakoresho kitwa « capteur » kakira umuco agasuzuma umwanya « capteur » imara yakira umuco kitwa « séclencheur » nako sita «  lencelle » gaharura umuco uja kuri «  capteur » hari insiguro ya hamwe hose .

![capteur](6.png)
##capteur: capteur ya camera yemera gute umuco .A. umuco winjira,B. Aka birikira k’amabara, c’umuco uhindurwa muyagankuba, D. capteur igizwe n’imiliyoni za Pixals zigeranya umuco .mucuma cose gifata ifoto kigezweho hariyo capteurs ziri numero zidasa uburebure n’uko zikoze.capteurs nini cane nizozo kubika amabara, n’amasanamu vyiza, canecane hari umuco muke .

![Gukoresha Iso mubice ibibanza bitandukanye](7.png) 
Ivyuma bifata amafoto bigezweho bishobora gushigwa ahantu hatandukanye hagabanya cnke hakongereaza amakari ku muco.ubwo buryo bwo guharura ayo makari ya capteur nibwo sita Iso, iharugwa muvyo bita “ plage numerique “ muri rusangi ni kuva kw’100 kugera kuma 800 no kurenga kuri agendanwa Iso ibwirizwa kuba iri hejuru canke hari umuco mukeya, (800) ikaba hasi iyo hari umuco mwinshi (100). 
Icuma gifata ifoto cawe kiriharurira conyene Iso.
Ariko vyinshi mubikozwe muburyo bwa Android  n’ubuhinga bw’ivyuma bifata ifoto birashobora guharura Iso n’intoke.

## obturateur ; Iyo mushimikiye, mufyonze kuri «  séclencheur » icuma gifata ifoto gituma «  capteur » Bavyita «  vitesse d’ obturation » mubijanye no gufotora ivyo babiharura muduce dutoduto tw’amasegonda .Iyo « obturateur » ifasha uwufata ifoto guharura uko afata ifoto.Iyo « obturateur » yotonda yikwega care,ico gufotora kinyiganyize, gishobora kuja kuri capteur, kikabonekamwo igipfungu .Ntimushobora kuronka ifoto nziza ijanye nuko obtunation ikora kuri « Téléphone  » ngendanwa.Amatelefone menshi ntafasha gusuzuma vyihuta vuba na vuba « obturateur  ».Ariko, camera nyinshi n’ubuhinga bwa Androïde biratanga uburyo bwo gusuzuma no guhinyanyura imbre yo gufotora amafoto , kuburyo uharura umwanya umuco wagiye kuri capteur nu mwanya muto.

![Umunwa wa camera ukora gute](8.png)
 ##  Umunwa wa camera ukora gute.
Umwana ni akenje, intoboro (diaphragne) isuzuma umuco uja kuri lentille ya camera. Uko umuco winjira ungana bivana n’uko umunwa ungana. Ari muto hinjira umuco muke kuri capteur.

## Inyabutatu yo guhagara mu gufata umuco .
![Akarorero mumwijima nigifungu.](9.jpg) 
Akarorero kifoto ifashwe nabi itikwiije.
![Akarorero , nziza , habona.](10.jpg)
Akarorero k’ifoto yikwije. 
Gukora isanamu, n’umuco umeze neza ni neza muguhinyanyura ISO, umunwa, na obturateur, ngo uronke isanamu imeze uko ushaka.
Camera zizimvye cane zifasha ufata ifoto kuyiharurira neza akoresheje iminwe, ariko na smartphone ubu zirafasha guharurira, gusuzuma umuco guhindura ISO canke gukora ku kiyo.
Hari n’izifise zoom ifasha kwagura canke kwegeranya.

## Working within limitations  
Understanding these limitations and working within them is the key to getting the most out of your smartphone camera. Remember, if you have a smartphone and you need photos for your story, plan your coverage around time of day or lighting conditions if possible.  
![Example of an unusable photo](11.jpg)  
Example of an unusable photo.  
![Usable example.](12.jpg)  
Example of a balanced photo.  
Additionally, while the image of ambulances speeding by might be a great one for your story, you may opt to also take a more static picture of the front of the hospital to make sure you have a usable image in case the ambulance photo doesn’t work out.

##Ntimwibagire ama camera  ya smartphone hari aho ageza muvyo ashobora gukora vyagereranije n’ivyuma binini binini na cane cane ayagereranije na “ dSLRs”. Ntumugira urugero rungana mugusuzuma n’iminwe mugufata ifoto na telephone nk’uko mubigira na camera nini canke dSLRs. Camera za smartphone zikora nabi iyo ufata isanamu yinyigagiza cane kandi ningoga.
